subject: assert keywork
msgSnippet: I use JUnit in Eclipse 3.0. When an assert (java keyword) fail, the test  go on instead of terminate with an error. How can I detect an assert failure in
messageBody:
I use JUnit in Eclipse 3.0. When an assert (java keyword) fail, the
test go on instead of terminate with an error. How can I detect an
assert failure in tests?
Bye
Alberto
